title: About Me
text:
Background
I was born and raised in San Francisco, California. I grew up spending lots of time in nature whether that was playing sports or hiking. I fell in love with the outdoors at a young age and have been passionate about the environment ever since!
![](images/backpacking.jpeg)

title: Chloe Carlstrom
text: Hi! My name is Chloe and I am a soon-to-be graduate of the University of California, Santa Barbara. I am an Environmental Studies B.S. student especially interested in conservation, restoration ecology, sustainable food systems, and marine biology.
